snippet: The Dutch brewer extended its reach into Asia after it agreed to buy a stake in Asia Pacific Breweries, one the region's biggest brewers, for around $4.1 billion
abstract: The Dutch brewer extended its reach into Asia after it agreed to buy a stake in Asia Pacific Breweries, one the region's biggest brewers, for around $4.1 billion

headline.main: Heineken to Buy Stake in Asia Pacific Breweries for $4.1 Billion
